forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere hints at a serene yet slightly overcast evening. The forecast suggests a modest high of 56, though the air has cooled to a comfortable 53 this afternoon. The usual crispness of the season envelops the city, with a gentle north-northwest breeze brushing past, carrying whispers of the Pacific. While the overarching blankets of cloud create a tranquil ambiance, the day retains a certain clarity, with sunlight softly spilling through the gaps, casting muted shadows across the urban landscape.

Tonight promises to cradle the city under a partly cloudy sky, with temperatures dipping to around 43. The prospect of fog remains minimal, yet the characteristic marine layer may linger near the coast, framing the Golden Gate Bridge with an ethereal touch. This evening’s coolness invites one to dress warmly—perhaps a light jacket paired with a cozy scarf, perfect for an amble through the quieter streets or a casual gathering at a local café. With the festive spirit of the holidays still in the air, a stroll along the waterfront or observing the twinkling lights reflecting off the bay would be a delightful way to embrace the evening, enjoying the calm before the bustle of another day.
